title: Professional English Writing Proficiency Improvement Program Utilizing Digital Storytelling

context.prior_knowledge: Proficiency in basic English grammar and daily conversation, with foundational digital device operation skills
context.additional_context: Collaborative writing tasks using digital storytelling to improve workplace English writing skills for professionals, conducted asynchronously via LMS.

learning_goals: Learners can compose 150+ word English paragraphs based on work-related scenarios using digital storytelling tools
Learners can revise English writing drafts two or more times incorporating peer feedback
Learners can incorporate 50+ specialized English vocabulary items (medical/legal/technical) aligned with storytelling elements
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
